meta_title: How a Food Plant Used PdM to Boost OEE by 15% [The Playbook]
meta_description: Discover the step-by-step playbook a food & beverage plant used to implement predictive maintenance (PdM) and achieve a 15% OEE improvement.
title: The Unvarnished Playbook: How a Food & Beverage Plant Used PdM to Improve OEE by 15%
keyword: how a food & beverage plant used pdm to improve oee by 15%

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Unvarnished Playbook: How a Food & Beverage Plant Used PdM to Improve OEE by 15%

image_prompt: A photorealistic, high-quality professional image set in a modern, clean food and beverage bottling plant. In the foreground, a female maintenance manager of Hispanic descent and a male technician of Black descent are looking at a tablet together. The tablet screen shows a graph with a rising trend line and a green-to-red gauge, indicating predictive maintenance data. They are both wearing appropriate PPE: white lab coats, hairnets, and safety glasses. In the brightly lit background, a large, complex stainless steel filling and capping machine is visible but slightly out of focus. The overall mood is collaborative, professional, and tech-forward. No text on the image.
